site_ai_studymate_osobenno_polezen_shkol: AI‑StudyMate is especially useful for schoolchildren and students who want to learn easier and smarter; those who are preparing for exams and tests; everyone who values ​​time and wants technology to truly help them master the material.
site_ai_studymate_prevraschaet_konspekty: AI-StudyMate - turns notes, voice recordings and lesson plans into a structured learning system.
site_ai_studymate_prevraschaet_razroznen: AI‑StudyMate turns scattered notes, voice recordings and lesson plans into a clear, structured and motivating learning system.
site_druzhelyubnyy_sobesednik_kotoryy_ob: A friendly interlocutor who explains complex things in simple language, adapts to your level and conducts a dialogue in Russian.
site_na_glavnom_ekrane_vsyo_vazhnoe_svez: Everything important is on the main screen: the latest insights of the week, progress, upcoming tasks and quick actions. Without fuss and unnecessary screens.
site_on_sohranyaet_lektsii_v_fone_a_zate: It stores lectures in the background, and then helps you “pull out” the most important things from them: transcripts, abstracts, short notes and ideas for questions.
site_po_vashim_konspektam_i_lektsiyam_ai: Based on your notes and lectures, AI‑StudyMate creates questions, helps you quickly test your knowledge of terms and concepts, and records the results.
site_prevraschaet_namereniya_v_privychku: Turns intentions into habits. In a couple of clicks, you have a weekly plan with realistic tasks and a clear focus for today.
site_sdelayte_snimok_i_cherez_minutu_u_v: Take a photo - and in a minute you have structured material: a brief summary of the topic, a list of main meanings and questions for memory training.
site_v_tsentre_ai_studymate_klyuchevye_s: AI‑StudyMate focuses on the key scenarios that make up modern learning. The application carefully puts everything in its place and helps you understand complex topics.
